2 Things- 1st, if this is "only an ISO file of 'Cov. Op's'", does that mean I need the base game in my comp. or it's useless? Cause if so, your connections to GET the disc(s) don't appear to be functional-Know of anywhere else I can find it?

1. yes you need full game to play this expansion
2. tiberian dawn is the first of the c&c series. the orthers are:
Red alert 1
Tiberian sun
Red Alert 2
Renegade
Generals
Tiberian wars
hey, i deleted the torent, i can make a new one if u want, sorry, thats y it doesnt work lol

Tiberium Dawn is the first C&C game Released in 95. Covert Ops is the expansion released in 96 i think. The Red Alert and Generals is under the C&C franchise but have nothing to do with the Tiberium Storyline. The 2nd "Tiberium" game would be Tiberium Sun set probably about 20 years in the future released in 99. The 3rd and latest would be Tiberium Wars set half a century in the future released in 2007 and the expansion is Kane Edition. 

Red Alert was released after C&C covert ops, it has an entirely different storyline with no references to tiburium

Generals has nothing to do with any of the other games
Generals is from the same developers

http://www.cncnz.com/files/cnc/utils.php

If you like c&c tib dawn you'll love this
